metadata.bonus_rules: Set bonuses are additive. For example, with 6 pieces equipped, you get the 2-piece, 4-piece, and 6-piece bonuses.

Grace of the Flagellant.description: A set focused on DoT, channeled, and AoE damage builds.

bonuses.2: Increases all continual, channeled, and persistent ground damage by 15%.
bonuses.4: Each time you damage an individual enemy 5 times, you deal additional damage to that enemy.
bonuses.6: Each time you deal damage, you have a chance to unleash a lightning strike, dealing AoE damage and stunning enemies.

Grace of the Flagellant.use_case: Best for DoT, channeled, or AoE damage builds.

Untouchable Mountebank.description: A defensive set that provides shields and damage reflection.

bonuses.2: Grants a chance to gain a shield that absorbs damage equal to 13% of your maximum Life.
bonuses.4: When the shield expires, it deals damage to nearby enemies equal to 40% of the damage absorbed.
bonuses.6: Increases all damage you deal by 10% while the shield is active.

War Rags of Shal'baas.description: A set focused on Primary Attack damage and speed.

bonuses.6: Primary Attacks have a 5% chance to increase your Attack Speed for 10 seconds.

Issatar Imbued.description: A set focused on movement speed and damage scaling.

bonuses.2: Each time you defeat an enemy, you gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
bonuses.4: Damage dealt increased by 2.5% for every 5% increase in your Movement Speed, up to 25%.
bonuses.6: Movement Speed bonuses can now stack 10 times, further increasing damage per stack.

Windloft Perfection.description: A set focused on movement and damage avoidance.

bonuses.2: Gain Thousand Winds, increasing your Movement Speed by 15%. Thousand Winds deactivates if you take damage.
bonuses.4: Thousand Winds also grants a 20% increase in damage dealt.
bonuses.6: Gain immunity to damage for 1 second after Thousand Winds deactivates.

Windloft Perfection.use_case: Suited for kiting, mobility builds, or speed-focused gameplay.

Shepherd's Call to Wolves.description: A set focused on summons and critical hits.

bonuses.4: Critical Hit Chance increased by 3% for each of your summons, up to a maximum of 18%.
bonuses.6: Your summons enter a frenzied state, increasing their Attack Speed by 60% for 10 seconds when they critically hit.

Feasting Baron's Pack.description: A set focused on crowd control and bonus damage.

bonuses.2: Increases the duration of your crowd control effects by 30%.
bonuses.4: Increases all damage by 15% to enemies suffering from loss of control effects.
bonuses.6: Unleashes a nova of ice, damaging and freezing enemies when you defeat a controlled enemy.

Vithu's Urges.description: A set focused on beneficial effects and attack speed.

bonuses.2: Increases the duration of beneficial effects on you and your allies by 30%.
bonuses.4: Increases Attack Speed by 30% for 3 seconds after using a beneficial effect.
bonuses.6: Doubles the duration of beneficial effects applied to you.

Vithu's Urges.use_case: Best for support or team-focused builds.

Gloomguide's Prize.description: A set focused on dash skills and burst damage.

bonuses.2: Gain bonus damage for 3 seconds after using a dash skill.
bonuses.4: Increases Critical Hit Chance for 3 seconds after dashing.
bonuses.6: AoE explosion around your dash target, dealing heavy damage.

Gloomguide's Prize.use_case: Perfect for burst damage builds using mobility.

Banquet of Eyes.description: A set focused on crowd control and critical damage.

bonuses.2: Increases damage by 15% to enemies who are slowed, stunned, or immobilized.
bonuses.4: Increases your Critical Hit Damage by 25%.
bonuses.6: Inflicting crowd control effects on enemies triggers a damaging AoE explosion.

Banquet of Eyes.use_case: Best for crowd control and critical damage synergies.

Seeds of Sown Gold.description: A set focused on gold finding.

bonuses.4: Nearby enemies drop bonus gold when you defeat them.
bonuses.6: Increases gold find in areas by 50%.

Seeds of Sown Gold.use_case: Focused on gold farming and niche utility.

Angmet's Conflagration.description: A set focused on fire and burn damage.

bonuses.4: Enemies afflicted by burn take an additional 15% damage.
bonuses.6: Burning damage has a chance to chain to nearby enemies.

Prayer for Endwinter.description: A set focused on cold damage and control.

bonuses.4: Enemies afflicted by cold take an additional 15% damage.
bonuses.6: Frozen enemies explode upon death, dealing AoE damage.
